message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by myself. Given its quality and uniqueness, I believe it would be worth more than $100 to you. Considering its true worth and the value it can bring to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $120. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant savings compared to its market value. I trust you will find the product invaluable and worth every penny. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
